Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: The percentage of planned audits that are completed.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Audits / Total Scheduled Audits) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: The percentage of processes or products that meet regulatory and internal standards.
The total number of instances where processes or products do not meet requirements.
The percentage of corrective actions that are successfully implemented.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.FORMULA: (Number of Corrective Actions Implemented / Total Corrective Actions) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: The classification of audit findings based on their impact and severity.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.FORMULA: Total Severity of Audit Findings / Number of Audit Findings

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: How often audits are conducted within a specific period.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.FORMULA: Number of Audits Conducted / Time Period

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: The total time taken to complete an audit cycle.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.FORMULA: Total Audit Cycle Time / Number of Audits Conducted

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Complian.EXPLANATION: The total costs associated with maintaining compliance with regulations and standards.
